lore:
Automatons began to be mass-produced some time ago in a factory in Neralim to supply the armies of the different kingdoms of Rodia, but clandestine factories quickly began producing them as well.

When an Automaton loses its master, it walks erratically and does not attack anyone unless it is threatened.

The blades on the Cursed Automaton's hands do not cause physical injuries, instead draining energy from their enemies. Anyone who is attacked by them will also experience very vivid nightmares for three days.
menagerieDialog: ENERGY LOW. PLEASE RECHARGE AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.
(You insert a piece of bread into its mouth. A few moments later, you have toast.)
(It's moving its legs in place as if it were walking. This is probably its unique way of showing off and trying to impress you and your other creatures.)
name: Cursed Automaton
